summary.para: Describes the root signature 1.1 layout of a descriptor table as a collection of descriptor ranges that are all relative to a single base descriptor handle.

remarks.para: Samplers are not allowed in the same descriptor table as constant-buffer views (CBVs), unordered-access views (UAVs), and shader-resource views (SRVs).
D3D12_ROOT_DESCRIPTOR_TABLE1 is the data type of the DescriptorTable member of . Use a D3D12_ROOT_DESCRIPTOR_TABLE1 when you set D3D12_ROOT_PARAMETER1's SlotType member to .
Refer to the helper structure CD3DX12_ROOT_DESCRIPTOR_TABLE1.

summary.para: The number of descriptor ranges in the table layout.
An array of structures that describe the descriptor ranges.
